sents_0.5:
['The minute we step foot down the stairs of the Urban Cottage, we felt right at home.  ', 'Nice to look out the windows from the "living room" to see greenery.  ', 'Urban Cottage was comfortable for the 3 of us--we were on the move, and there was room for one more!  ', 'We loved the the neighborhood and the surroundings and enjoyed the easy walk down to the park.  ', 'Whenever we left the cottage to go into town, we were always happy to come back and feel at home and enjoy the peacefulness.  ', 'Great location.  ', 'Walllingford is close to downtown, the Burke-Gilman trail, lots of shops, etc.', 'Her house is centrally located and stocked with all the amenities and comforts one could dream of (hot tub included).', 'My son and I had a perfect stay at this apartment.  ', 'The location is excellent.  ', 'It is walking distance to several great neighborhood coffee shops and to 45th street where everything is happening.  ', 'It is a great neighborhood for walking and you feel very safe.', 'Nice place to stay.  ', 'NIce place.', 'Great location.', 'Quick and easy trips to the city.', 'We had the main house and this down stairs apartment.', 'Everyone enjoyed the lovely garden, neighborhood and of course the classic turn of the 
century home. 
', 'My husband, son and I really enjoyed our time in the downstairs apartment in Wallingford.  ', 'Joyce has made the apartment welcoming, comfortable and created a lovely homely atmosphere with character of a country cottage.  ', 'The beds are really comfortable and the place is quiet at night -', 'Her place is set in a beautiful garden and tree lined street and yet, up the road there are an array of great shops, restaurants, galleries, parks and the Fremont Troll.  ', 'I loved staying in the Wallingford / Fremont area plus the bus is 2 minute walk and a 15 minute ride downtown to the major attractions of Seattle.  

', 'Joyce is also a helpful and fantastic host and she will give you lots of tips of things to see and places to eat and shop plus maps!  ', "We enjoyed an long week stay at Joyce's place.  ", 'It is a quiet location central to great shopping, bus lines and wonderful restaurants.  ', 'It is easy to catch a bus downtown and to other locations in Seattle.  ', 'The place was great, clean and well prepared.', 'The apartment was spacious enough for all three of us and the price was really great.', "Definitely recommended to live here if you're in the area.", 'The apt was neither too close or too far from any of the popular spots.', 'The place was lovely and the beds soooo comfy.  ', "It's a great location.", 'Close to good restaurants/coffee shops/bars.', 'Very friendly place.  ', 'The apartment was nice and comfortable.', 'The only thing to consider is that the stairs into the apartment are very steep, so be aware if you have young children or elderly.', 'It is central to all of the Seattle hotspots.', 'Place is very clean and comfortable, the beds were absolutely WONDERFUL!', 'Great location.', 'We plan on staying again when we come to Seattle to visit family!This is a great basement apartment within walking distance of great stores and restaurants in Wallingford!  ', 'The apartment was spacious and clean with several very comfortable beds.', 'Joyce was a great host who offered advice about navigating the area and made sure they had everything they might need during their stay.', 'Parking was available on the street and the location was within walking distance to Fremont and the bus stop. 

', 'Tenants of the down home basement apartment are required to use the concrete stairs to gain access.  ', 'My parents are elderly and were not able to safely maneuver the concrete stairs that were necessary to get from the street to the house and then to the basement apartment.   ', 'The basement apartment was clean and the kitchen had awesome utensils.  ', 'The location is close to public transportation and the neighborhood is quiet.  ', 'It was super convenient to have the washer and dryer access.  ', 'We stayed for three days and walked to Fremont street and Gasworks park easily.', 'Lots of shops and music venues in walking distance, surprisingly easy parking and a little neighborhood grocery store just a short block away.', 'The neighborhood is very quiet and safe and the house was also very quiet and peaceful.', 'The place is pretty much like in the photos, great use of space in that apartment and very comfortable beds.', 'The location is good because north south buses work well in Seattle.', 'The Wallingford street area is nothing to rave about, but Fremont at the bottom of the hill is really great.', 'She was very accommodating and gracious and had great suggestions on places to visit.', 'Most importantly, beds were first rate and location is perfect for exploring Seattle.  ', "We absolutely loved staying at Joyce's basement apartment.", 'The apartment is very close to a great commercial strip on N 45th St. that had great restaurants, bars, and shops.', 'She provided me with all of the necessary information to make the most of my trip; nice restaurants, places to visit, things to do etc.', 'The apartment was furnished with everything I needed and was very comfortable.

', "It's centrally located, west of campus and north of downtown area.", 'I highly recommend it as a place to stay for a couple or small family.', 'The down home, central and fab was the perfect location with a lovely, inviting yard in a lovely neighborhood.  ', 'The apartment is lovely and super clean.   ', 'Everything was exactly as shown in the photos, the apartment was quiet and very comfortable.  ', 'We loved the neighborhood and it was very central to everything.  ', 'Joyce was very responsive to our questions and an excellent hostess, although she was not in town while we were there, we did appreciate her leaving us snacks, fruit, etc....and we enjoyed meeting her adorable dog, Cleo!  ', "We had a great experience at Joyce's place.", 'Great location and Joyce got right back to us making our check in and check out a breeze.', 'Quiet home in quiet neighborhood walking distance to restaurants.', 'Very easy commute to downtown Seattle.', 'I would recommend  this location without a doubt.']

sents_0.5:
["If their availability calendar ever overlaps with the need for a place to stay in Seattle, don't hesitate.", 'Love the convenient location to Ballard/Freemont and more.  ', 'The use of the garden area was a special treat as the weather was fabulous!  

', 'We did not meet Brad and Liz as they were out of town.', "Brad and Liz's place was great!", 'The location is beautiful and right by some very cool places to visit.', 'We knew we were in good hands!Great place to stay!  ', 'Although our hosts were out of town, it was no problem getting in and around.  ', 'Great room with everything we needed, great location near to transit.  ', 'They know the area very well and are wonderful people all-around.

', 'The bed was super comfortable and the kitchenette/dining area was extremely convenient.', 'The neighborhood is safe and interesting, too -- we loved it.  ', "There's lots of cute shops and restaurants/bars nearby, as well as a variety of more nature-", 'We miss Ballard already!Liz and Brad welcomed us by chatting and explaining all about the place where we would call home for the next five days.  ', 'The apartment was clean, comfortable and more than adequate for our home away from home.  ', 'It was great place to spring from.  ', 'The neighborhood is fun too with lots going on and great eating places.', 'Location was perfect, an easy walk to many nice cafes including Cafe Besalu.', 'They gave us great recommendations for new places to check out in Ballard.', 'It was very easy to access public transportation from this location too when we needed to head downtown or catch the bus up to Mount Vernon.', 'We were very comfortable and Brad and Liz live in a great neighborhood', '-- in a quiet are that is walking distance to the main commercial strip and the Locks.', "Their home including the place you'll be staying is very comfortable and clean.", "The area of Ballard is gorgeous and it's an easy public transport connection to Downtown.", 'Great Neighborhood too.', "The quiet  location was perfect as  it was an easy walk to the Chittenden Locks, and picturesque downtown Ballard with all the great eating places and Farmer's Market on Sunday.", 'We took the #40 bus to downtown Seattle, so it was very convenient  for many reasons including ample parking.

 ', 'I am missing the Seattle area, and look forward to a return trip one day, and a chance to enjoy the Victorian home once more.', 'Brad and Liz accommodated our late arrival time with no difficulty, the place was just as advertised, and we had plenty of space.', 'Liz were great, the room was clean, and in a great location.  ', 'They were very welcoming and gave us some great tips about the area!
', 'The space was very nice & comfortable and very close to a lot of great shopping and.', 'Also, Ballard is a lovely area... plenty of shops, cafes and restaurants.', 'The apartment was very clean and spacious with everything we needed including a beautiful garden.', 'brad was available very late to let us  in, show us around and give us pointers on where to go in the neighborhood.', 'We were walking distance to all of the bars, restaurants and shops in Ballard and had a great time exploring the area and relaxing in the garden.', 'Would definitely stay here again!This was an excellent place to stay in the beautiful neighborhood.', 'They should install a motion detector for the stairs going down to apartment.  ', 'Great space in a great neighborhood.', 'Easy street parking.', 'They also left maps of Seattle and info about things to do which was a great touch.', 'The private entry was convenient for when we stayed out a little later.', 'And lastly, the location was perfect!', 'The apartment was great and matches the description accurately.   ', 'The property was beautiful and the neighborhood was convenient and walkable.  ', 'When we arrived, Brad showed us around the room/bathroom where we would be sleeping and getting ready, and then he sat down with us and chatted about what kinds of things there were to do around the area.', 'He was extremely friendly and made great suggestions as to where to eat, what venues to check out, etc.', 'He and Liz live in a beautiful residential neighborhood within walking area of breakfast places, nightlife, the bus system, and even the beach.', 'We always felt safe walking back late at night and really loved the area.', 'Close enough to Ballard shops and restaurants and adequate public transport to the rest of Seattle.  ', 'The space they rent is beautiful and well maintained - the Internet is speedy, the bed is comfy, and the neighborhood is quiet but near lots of lovely restaurants.', "Brad and Liz's home is comfortable and situated in a really fun part of Ballard.", 'Brad gave us a brief orientation to the neighborhood when we arrived which was really helpful.', "Thanks Brad and Liz!Beautiful lower-level space in Brad and Liz's home, situated in a really cool city neighborhood.", 'The place is equipped nicely with a very comfortable futon bed and sweet leather couch.  ', 'The location (Ballard) is very chill and features a lot of interesting places to hang out, as do the adjacent areas.  

', "This was my first experience renting a place like this and as far as I'm concerned, it was absolutely a home run in every way for me.  ", 'The pictures are accurate, the location is awesome!', 'We enjoyed the cats and the yard and the quiet neighborhood.', 'Highly Recommended!Very nice place to stay in a very good neighborhood.', "Of course you are staying in someone's home in a private area, so you will hear normal family sounds in the main part of the house.", 'Garden level so its a great place to sleep in late!The room we stayed in was perfect for myself and my husband.', 'The neighborhood was awesome and located in walking distance to downtown Ballard, which was so cute!', "The neighborhood was perfect for my needs and, while I didn't get to walk around as much as I would have liked, the area has a lot within easy walking distance.", 'The location is an easy to walk to buses to get downtown and very close to some beautiful parks!', 'Our hosts were friendly and welcoming and the neighbourhood is quite lovely and close to all Ballard has to offer, which is quite a bit.  ', 'The various amenities in Ballard were within walking distance, and Brad had very helpful recommendations for great food and coffee.

', 'Beautiful house in a great area.  ', 'Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to explore those areas and the rest of Seattle.', 'Brad and Liz provide a winning Seattle experience in the hip Ballard neighborhood.   ', 'Excellent stay!Pretty luxurious...warm, spacious, basically feels like your own apartment minus a stove.']

sents_0.5:
['The neighborhood was nice and the parking was good in front of the house.', 'The apartment is wonderful - beautifully decorated and so roomy and comfortable!', 'This was the perfect place for my parents to stay over the holidays.', 'Will recommend it to all my friends visiting from out of town as the perfect oasis for guests!With the Phinney Oasis, Kim has created a most comfortable place to stay in Seattle.', 'My partner and I were in town for the MLA conference, which took place at the Convention Center downtown.', 'on Phinney Ridge and nearby Ballard and Fremont.', 'We had an amazing time in this lovely, clean, convenient apartment.', 'The place was sparkling clean and we immediately felt at home with the new appliances, heated bathroom floor and comfy mattress.', 'I would recommend this place to everyone!Wonderful place.  ', 'Excellent location too.', 'The place was well stocked for food supplies, even some delicious fresh bread.', 'Recommendations for places in the area were great and they were always reachable if we had any questions.', 'I will definitely recommend this place to my friends.', 'Great location to Phinney-Ballard-Greenlake neighborhoods.', 'Apartment had everything - sitting area, dining area, full kitchen, shower stall bathroom, plenty of closets, own entrance, etc.

', 'They were available with tips about the area when asked.

', 'The apartment is really great and you will find everything you need.', 'They were always happy to help and gave me a lot of recommendations for activities in the surrounding neighborhoods.', 'It is a great place to stay in Seattle and much more familiar than staying in a hotel.', 'The apartment was immaculate when we got it, with a good amount of light and privacy.  ', 'They even provided a pack and play for my son, which was very convenient!  ', 'Their place exceeded my expectations.  ', 'The location was perfect for visiting my daughter and being close to public transportation.  ', 'This is a beautiful apartment (even better than the photos) with a really peaceful feel.  ', 'They were friendly and offered up plenty of area recommendations.', 'The place itself looks great in the photos, but was even better on arrival.', 'It was an easy commute (driving) to Lower Queen Anne, where I needed to be for work.', 'This is where we plan to stay on return trips to Seattle!Kim and Stewart were great.', 'We did not just stay in their wonderful basement apartment, we became friends and hope to stay with them again.', 'This was the first time we had our own space very close to our family and friends.', 'The location was perfect for us, close to Ballard restaurants, library, post office and beaches and easy access to downtown, University district and shopping at Northgate Mall.', 'Excellent restaurants, groceries and bakeries within walking distance.', "Kim and Stewart's was the perfect place for us.", 'Our last night in town Kim, my daughter', "I really enjoyed my stay in Kim and Stewart's apartment.", "I've traveled extensively all over the world and the Elegant Oasis is one of the most comfortable places I've ever stayed.", "It's close to the very vibrant communities of Ballard and Phinney Ridge and it was an easy walk to both the Green Lake walking path and the Woodland Park Zoo.", 'I barely left the area the entire time week because there is so much to do right there.', "The 'oasis' is fabulous - everything you would ever need is in the apartment and it is cozy and comfortable and in a great, quiet neighborhood within walking distance to coffee shops and restaurants.  ", 'My husband and I so enjoyed our stay and the hosts were so accommodating and helpful in sharing information on places to go to, etc.  ', "so pleasant!!In town for a conference, two of us stayed at Kim and Stewart's.", 'We arranged this stay for a colleague who was in town.', 'We highly recommend this apt to anyone looking for a place to stay in a great Seattle neighborhood!', "Kim & Stewart's apartment is as advertised.  ", 'Had to go outside to get good cell phone coverage, but that could have been due to our cell carrier (we are from Anchorage, AK).Kim has a wonderful very priviate basement apt for stays in the Ballard area.  ', 'Perfect!!!!!Warm apartment greeted me, even though hosts were away.  ', 'Felt like my own place.  ', 'We had everything we needed in comfortable, charming, reasonably priced surroundings.', 'The apartment was great, extremely clean and comfortable with everything provided you could possibly need - down to spices and herbs for cooking!  ', 'The location is great, with easy access to buses or zipcars.  ', 'I highly recommend this as a place to stay, whether you are coming to Seattle to visit friends or family or just to sight see.', 'Lovely place!  ', 'The apartment was contemporary and clean, and the location was perfect.', "Also amazing was Kim's offer ahead of time to set up a Pack n' Play for us, so we didn't have to lug ours across the country.", "We'll definitely stay here again during our next trip to Seattle!Tell others in the Airbnb community about your stay.", 'The apartment is exactly as pictured: Quirky but comfortable, with everything you might need for a couple nights or a couple weeks.', "Our trip was a bit of a whirlwind—we needed to stay somewhere in the neighborhood due to a series of family events over a holiday weekend, and Kim's house would've been perfect on location alone", "(it's in a good spot to get to almost anywhere in the city quickly by car, yet you're tucked into a very quiet, safe neighborhood).", "There's plenty of nearby restaurants and shops.

", 'We heard them upstairs a couple times, but the apartment is very well insulated and noise from anywhere is certainly not a problem.

', 'We had a rental car and found street parking at the house and getting around the city very easy.', "As such, I can't comment on how access to public transit is from this location.", 'The streets in this neighborhood are narrow and generally parked-in on both sides; if your rental car is a giant SUV or something, it may be a challenge getting in and out.

3.', "Because it's a basement apartment, the ceiling is low in a couple places.", "We absolutely recommend Kim's apartment, and would stay there again in a heartbeat.", 'The apartment was just lovely, with great amenities, such as the kitchen, laundry and modern touches.', 'It is in a great location, with wonderful shops, restaurants, and coffee shops within walking distance.', 'The apartment is also a very easy drive downtown - we were to the space needle, waterfront, etc within 10 minutes.', 'Both Kim and Stewart have a wealth of knowledge on things to do, places to eat, etc in the area and in Seattle as well, which we were thankful for. 

', 'The only thing I was unaware of is the fact that this is more of a studio apartment, as the bedroom is not enclosed, and is open without a door/curtain from one side of the bedroom near the bathroom entrance.', 'The apartment was very clean and comfortable.', 'When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised that the apartment was completed baby proofed, which meant a lot to us since we have two very active young children.', 'Kim sent me a list of places to eat near by.  ', 'There is a really good coffee place just around the corner.  ', 'Also make sure you make your way up to Honore Bakery on 70th Street @ 15th Ave.  ', 'Airbnb folks would be that you really do need a car in this location, street parking is no problem, and to watch your feet as you walk around the bed, there is a wooden frame that is wider than the bed itself and we both stubbed our toes.   ', "Great quiet neighborhood that's conveniently located.", 'Kim was out of town but Stewart was personable, helpful, and available.', "Karen & Roger, Tennessee Kim and Stewart are wonderful hosts; we've stayed in their place twice now and we will plan on doing so again the next time we are in Seattle.", 'Their apartment is very clean and inviting to be in which is a huge priority for me.', 'Their apartment is in a good location within walking distance to all the restaurants and amenities of the Phinney Ridge neighborhood and the 3 mile walk around bustling Green Lake.', "Our stay at Kim and Stewart's place was a great first experience with Airbnb.  ", 'The place was wonderfully appointed with everything that we needed for our stay to be comfortable including a washer and dryer.  ', 'Both she and her husband were wonderful hosts - sharing their knowledge of Seattle and the area to ensure that we would find things to do that were fun for us.', "We loved Kim's place!   ", "I'm six feet tall, but didn't come in contact with the ceiling that is sub-six-foot in a few places.   ", 'The Phinney Ridge neighborhood is charming with some good nearby bars and coffee houses, as well as a wide choice up the hill along Phinney & Greenwood Aves.   ', 'They recommend the Honore Artisan Bakery, which is excellent and known across Seattle.   ', 'We enjoyed downtown Ballard, which is easy to get to by bus or rental car (or via an "urban hike").   ', 'Great quiet neighborhood!

', "They had also offered to have a pack and play ready for us which we didn't need since our hotel stay the previous weekend required us to travel with our own crib. 

", 'My husband is 6'2" and bonked his head a could of times in the same place.', "The bedroom space is actually raised a couple inches and the ceiling is also lower in the walkway from the bedroom to the bathroom so just beware or avoid this area if you're tall.", 'There is parking available', "but I think you'd need a truck or SUV to clear the lip just because of the grades between the street, the sidewalk and the driveway.", 'Street parking was no problem for us and we were able to find space out front.

', 'There are a bunch places within a couple of blocks to grab a bite or a latte.', "The apartment is convenient to buses to get downtown, and there's food and coffee close by!  
", 'Phinney Oasis is a great place to stay.', "KIm's place in Phinney is perfect for us.  ", 'It is close to my very favorite coffe shop that ships coffee to me all the way to Boston...', "Kim's place was warm and welcoming.  ", 'The apartment was exactly what we needed.', 'Great location, apartment was roomy, clean and well furnished.  ', 'The Oasis is truly that--it is a wonderful place in a great neighborhood.

', 'Well appointed and  centrally located, it was the perfect place for us to stay during our business trip to Seattle.', 'This little apartment was so perfect!', 'The neighborhood was perfect for someone without a vehicle.such a great place!', 'quiet and wonderful neighborhood, so many amazing gardens around.', 'it was a pleasure just to walk around the area and stop here and there to taste all the delicious food you can find within walking distance from the house.', 'the place was clean, comfortable, new and kim was very helpful and kind.', 'it was a really nice stay!The suite was everything I needed for my stay, and the location was great for access to my work and interesting restaurants.', 'My boyfriend and I were in town for a UW graduation and stayed at Phinney Oasis for about five nights.', 'Kim and Stewart were very gracious hosts and ensured our (very) late check-in was convenient and comfortable.', 'The amenities in the apartment exceeded our expectations - we had to work from Seattle during the week and found it very convenient and enjoyable to work from there.', 'The place is clean, quiet, comfortable, and convenient to what I need to get done while in Seattle.

', 'Great neighborhood!', 'with ample, easy parking for a good-sized family van loaded with vacation gear.', 'Attention to detail in the apartment made our stay pleasant.', 'The neighborhood is nice and quiet.', "The oasis offers a fine place for a good night's sleep :)", 'Location worked really well for access to my office, and I was able to try out some of the recommended food choices.  ', 'The apartment was clean and well-organized. ['The neighborhood was nice and the parking was good in front of the house.', 'My partner and I were in town for the MLA conference, which took place at the Convention Center downtown.', 'on Phinney Ridge and nearby Ballard and Fremont.', 'Excellent location too.', 'Recommendations for places in the area were great and they were always reachable if we had any questions.', 'Great location to Phinney-Ballard-Greenlake neighborhoods.', 'Apartment had everything - sitting area, dining area, full kitchen, shower stall bathroom, plenty of closets, own entrance, etc.

', 'They were available with tips about the area when asked.

', 'They were always happy to help and gave me a lot of recommendations for activities in the surrounding neighborhoods.', 'The location was perfect for visiting my daughter and being close to public transportation.  ', 'They were friendly and offered up plenty of area recommendations.', 'The location was perfect for us, close to Ballard restaurants, library, post office and beaches and easy access to downtown, University district and shopping at Northgate Mall.', 'I barely left the area the entire time week because there is so much to do right there.', "The 'oasis' is fabulous - everything you would ever need is in the apartment and it is cozy and comfortable and in a great, quiet neighborhood within walking distance to coffee shops and restaurants.  ", 'We highly recommend this apt to anyone looking for a place to stay in a great Seattle neighborhood!', 'Had to go outside to get good cell phone coverage, but that could have been due to our cell carrier (we are from Anchorage, AK).Kim has a wonderful very priviate basement apt for stays in the Ballard area.  ', 'The location is great, with easy access to buses or zipcars.  ', 'The apartment was contemporary and clean, and the location was perfect.', "Our trip was a bit of a whirlwind—we needed to stay somewhere in the neighborhood due to a series of family events over a holiday weekend, and Kim's house would've been perfect on location alone", "(it's in a good spot to get to almost anywhere in the city quickly by car, yet you're tucked into a very quiet, safe neighborhood).", "There's plenty of nearby restaurants and shops.

", "As such, I can't comment on how access to public transit is from this location.", 'The streets in this neighborhood are narrow and generally parked-in on both sides; if your rental car is a giant SUV or something, it may be a challenge getting in and out.

3.', 'It is in a great location, with wonderful shops, restaurants, and coffee shops within walking distance.', 'The apartment is also a very easy drive downtown - we were to the space needle, waterfront, etc within 10 minutes.', 'Both Kim and Stewart have a wealth of knowledge on things to do, places to eat, etc in the area and in Seattle as well, which we were thankful for.

', "The bedroom space is actually raised a couple inches and the ceiling is also lower in the walkway from the bedroom to the bathroom so just beware or avoid this area if you're tall.", "The apartment is convenient to buses to get downtown, and there's food and coffee close by!

['My brother and I were stuck in Seattle--all hotel rooms in the city were booked.', "Literally last minute we found Chad and Ruben's place.", 'It was perfectly located in funky Capitol Hill.', 'It was an excellent homebase for exploring the city. 

', "C&R's place was clean and the bathroom was big.", 'Great house, great location, great hosts.', 'Their apartment is convenient in a hip part of town, clean and spacious - with a great private bathroom!  ', "I would highly recommend this stay and thank you both so much for a great experience!I needed a place to stay for PAX, and found Chad & Ruben's place.", 'They were easy to contact and offered lots of suggestions and insights into the Seattle area.', 'The location is just a short 10 min walk down to the Convention Center.

', 'The room is a spacious den area with a twin size bed and a full bathroom.', 'A bottle of water, an iPhone charger, maps of Seattle and ear plugs were conveniently provided for use in the room.

', "Chad and Ruben (and their adorable pup)'s place in Capitol Hill was perfect for my quick stay in Seattle!", 'They were very helpful when I was trying to figure out where to go and the best way to get there.', 'The location is great!', 'Getting to and from major attractions was easy by foot and by bus.', 'Their property is also close to lots of places to eat and hang out in the Capitol Hill area.', "I would totally stay here again if I'm back in the area!", 'Their listing is in a perfect location for exploring Downtown, but the neighborhood itself is worth checking out as well.', 'Their house is conveniently located in Capitol Hill and is a short walk from amazing cafes, eateries and pubs.', 'We would stay here again--and so should you!Great place located right in the cultural epi center of seattle.', 'Capital hill is where its at and staying with Chad and Ruben was great!!!', 'I came to Seattle (my home-town) for a job interview.', 'This location is so easy for public transit, and anything else you could need can readily be had within a 3-block radius.', 'There is even an impressive supply of high-end hotel toiletries, and a hair dryer.', 'There is a little bit of normal urban neighborhood street noise at night, but your hosts provide a white-noise fan and ear plugs if you need them (I was fine).

', 'Their home is clean and charming and is a perfect place to stay in Seattle.  ', 'The location was perfect--close to a lot of restaurants and shops.', 'Chad and Ruben gave us some great places to check out around the city.', 'We would definitely recommend this place.', 'Wonderful hosts and a great location!', 'It was so easy to walk from the apartment to great restaurants and cafes.', 'Chad and Rueben have done an amazing job of creating a soft and very welcoming room near the entrance of their super cool home so you feel comfortable as either the daytime busy body or social night owl.', 'The room is in the perfect spot for the city, and we will definitely be coming back.', 'The place was clean and adorable and a great location!Wonderful location within walking distance to restaurants, cafes, clubs, and other attractions in the Capitol Hill neighborhood of Seattle.', 'Convenient to downtown, Space Needle, transit and other attractions.', "It's basically like your own private apartment but Chad and Ruben are there if you need help or have questions.", 'Their home is in an ideal location, within easy walking distance to a main drag of Broadway. 

', 'My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our one-night stay and will definitely look to stay here again!Chad and Ruben offer ideal accommodations with privacy and a location close to everything.  ', 'We had a car but walked nearly everywhere, including downtown to the Opera.  ', 'Street parking is very difficult and public garages are scarce in this area.  ', 'Still, the location and friendly hosts make this an excellent choice.', "Our stay at Chad and Ruben's place was wonderful.", "We felt very comfortable and it's a beautiful apartment and vicinity.", "I've paid twice as much for hotel rooms that could not hold a candle to this space.", 'The location was perfect for us and the parking is available but you may have to park a block away but no big deal.  ', 'We look forward to staying again!For our first airbnb experience we had found the ideal place at Chad and Rubens house.
', 'The room is very cozy, the private bathroom very convenient and clean!', 'The whole 
Going to town was in walking distance (about 15-20 min.)', 'but there is also a busstation close by with a starbucks at the corner ;)
', 'The location is amazing, with a bus stop into town just a block away, and Capitol Hill nightlife an easy walk down Broadway.', 'I felt safe walking alone in the area, even late at night.', 'I really have only glowingly positive things to say about this place and my hosts!', 'again!I was looking for a convenient and clean place to crash and shower.  ', 'great place - i recommend!

', 'The room was clean and spacious with an adjoined, private bathroom.  ', "While our schedules didn't give us an opportunity to meet in-person, they were polite and communicative via email and very instructive on how to access the house and its location.  ", "I'd highly recommend their place", 'Thanks!Great room, bed, location and shower.', 'This place was beautiful!', "Great neighborhood, safe and quiet location, easy access to Capitol Hill's Broadway and downtown.", 'I only stayed here 2 nights, but would love to stay again the next time I am in town.', 'Ruben even suggested a few food places to check out nearby.', 'The location is walking distance to night life in Capitol Hill and about a 25-minute walk to Downtown and Pike but coming back is quite the uphill trek.', 'Great place to stay if location and privacy are key priorities.', 'I would definitely recommend this place!

', 'I barely saw them, but their place is very convenient, clean, and comfortable.', 'Perfect location.  ', 'The neighborhood has wonderful places to eat, walk and shop.  ', 'All our Seattle sights were within walking distance or near transit.', 'Street parking is available, but certain times or days of the week can be a challenge.', 'Ruben offers friendly and helpful suggestions, maps, your wish is his desire.  ', 'If you need a place to stay in Seattle, stay with them!Chad and Ruben were excellent hosts.', 'Located in a cool area of town so we were able to walk around and explore the neighborhood.', "Chad and Ruben's place in Capitol Hill is the best!  ", "The location couldn't be better if you are looking to experience the best social scene in Seattle.  ", 'We were just a few minutes walk from upper Pine and Pike streets with great bars and breweries (like The Elysian).  ', "Also just a short walk down to Melrose Market where I would recommend Taylor Shellfish for the freshest seafood I've ever experienced.  ", 'Their guest room was conveniently located at the front of the house and both the bedroom and bathroom were spotless.  ', "Parking can be a bit challenging but that's Seattle for you.  ", 'Communication, accommodation, hospitality, convenience, and location were all top notch.', 'I highly recommend staying with C&R if you are in the Seattle area...as I will not hesitate to book with them again if I am in town.', "Our first Air BnB experience and certainly not our last now that we stayed at Chad and Ruben's place.", 'Great location, quiet and relaxing room.', 'Fantastic location, thanks again!', 'Chad and Ruben have a lovely room in a great location.', 'The private bathroom is bigger than my apartment ;)', "Chad and Ruben's place was everything you could ask for from an Airbnb listing -- extremely clean, quiet, private, and comfortable.", "Checking-in/out is very convenient; we didn't have to wake them to accomodate our late check-in/early check-out.", 'others in the Airbnb community about your stay.', 'I barely saw them because they rarely use the first floor where the room is located, but the two times I ran into them they were really pleasant and informative.', 'The location is pretty perfect too.', "There's plenty of cafes, bars, and restaurants within walking distance from their home.", 'All in all a great experience!great space and chad & ruben were professional and prepped the place well for us.  ', "Extremely comfortable and quiet room, and the bed was like you'd find in a luxury hotel.  ", 'I had beed concerned about parking, because I used to live in that neighborhood, but I was always easily able to find a space within two blocks of the house.', 'It is centrally located on a quiet street in lively neighborhood.', 'Great area in Seattle and beautiful home!  ', 'Check-in was easy and loved meeting them and their recommendations on things to do!Convenient location, room is clean & tidy.', "I highly recommend this room to people who'd like to stay in the city and not burn a hole in your (website hidden).", 'Loved the location -- quiet but a short walk to either the Broadway or Pike/Pine corridors for nightlife and restaurants.  ', "We had a very short stay at Chad and Ruben's place", 'Their house was in the perfect location for walking around Seattle and exploring.', 'The room was super nice and quiet and the attached bathroom made it feel like a mini hotel, except better.', 'We definitely recommend their place to anyone looking to visit Seattle and explore the city.', "Can't wait to go back!Great location and fabulous place and great guys.", "Catch the 49 or 43 bus not the 60 as Metro Trans told us, it's easy to get to and from town on.", "Their home is located in a perfect location so close to everything fun but quiet as well so it's a lovely retreat in the middle of the city.  ", 'The house and room were very well kept and in a fantastic location; walking distance to a ton of great bars and restaurants.', 'We even walked to the space needle and pike place market.', 'Highly recommend staying here to anyone looking for a comfortable stay in an awesome neighborhood.  ', 'My girlfriend and I got stuck in Seattle and needed a place last minute.', "If we're ever in Seattle again this is where we'll be staying.", "I stayed at Chad's & Ruben's place", 'Perfect location near Broadway with good restaurants and I also like pretty much the fancy Capitol Hill area.', 'Honestly, the place was so quiet, we hardly knew we were sharing with Chad and Ruben.  ', "Their house is walking distance (less than 10 min) from two to-die-for coffee shops: Top Pot (damn fine donuts) and Vivace's Brix location (other-worldly caramel macchiato).  ", 'We were without a car and the central location was appreciated; the International district is about a 30 minute walk and', 'Pike Place Market is about 25.  ', 'My husband had a meeting in the convention district and that was only a 15 minute walk (or $6 cab).  ', "We were in Seattle for less than 30 hours and I wish we'd had more time to explore Capitol Hill because we had such a great place to stay.", 'I love the keyless entry as well, which makes things super convenient.', 'Their place was perfect for our weekend getaway.', 'Location was ideal for easy access downtown.  ', "and Ruben's place was great!  ", "We were only there overnight and didn't get to meet, but their messages were friendly and their place was really comfortable.  ", 'Its in a great location (right off of Broadway), but its still really quiet.  ', 'Convenient location, easy to find, and communicative hosts.', 'Thank you again!Quiet, cozy room in a great location.  ', "You really can't beat the location - we walked everywhere and really enjoyed the coffee, restaurants, and nightlife of Capitol Hill.", "We had a wonderful night at Chad and Ruben's place.", 'Very clean, exactly as described and in an ideal location.', 'Thank you so much, we hope to visit again soon!Excellent location and cute room.', 'Was a perfect place for a short business trip.', 'Great location', 'and I could walk to downtown and space needle within 20 minutes.', 'Their home is warm and lovely and in an ideal location.', 'We were within a half mile of dozens of amazing restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bookstores, and local boutiques and markets.', 'I loved the neighborhood and the convenience to downtown.  ', 'Parking was difficult being in the Capitol Hill neighborhood', 'The location is quiet, but very close to the heart of Capitol Hill restaurants and shops.', 'The location is perfect.', 'There are lots of restaurants, bars, fun spots and stores at walking distance.', 'The location is perfect, close to where you really want to be.  ', 'Very clean room and convenient to downtown.', 'Chad and Ruben were wonderful hosts and the apartment was charming.', 'The location was great.', 'Chad and Ruben both gave me excellent suggestions on my apartment searching in Seattle.', 'Great place and great hosts.', 'Lovely place right in the centre of Capitol Hill, perfect for the bars and restaurants.', 'Also on several bus routes from downtown, great for everywhere.', 'Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, the place was perfect.', 'Chad and Ruben are super considerate hosts with a charming, clean, and conveniently-located house.', 'They even helped us out with restaurant recommendations and directions around the city!', 'Great location for coffee and brews.', 'If I am ever in town again, I will definitely be staying with them!My stay', "I would rate this b'nb very highly, right in the heart of the city, making inner city transit very easy...", 'I will never stay in another hotel chain again!  ', 'The place is centrally located and tidy and their dog is gorgeous.', 'We also got lots of tips on local restaurants and sights for our next few cities.', 'The location and room we were provided was PERFECT.', "Chad and Ruben's home is nestled in Capitol Hill on a quiet street.", 'It took us about 15 minutes to walk to the space needle and from there maybe 10 more minutes to walk to pike place market.', "Coming and going couldn't have been more convenient.", 'For any travelers who plan to bring a car, be prepared to spend anywhere from five to twenty minutes looking for street parking!  ', 'There is a lot of construction going on around the Capitol Hill district, and many streets have sections blocked off.

', "I would love to stay here again!Chad and Ruben's place is really cute.  ", 'The location is convenient and I was able to get what I needed at all of the local establishments right in the area.  ', 'It was a clean, welcoming room with a bathroom, which was super convenient.', 'The location was prime as well.', 'It was a 15 minute walk to downtown and it had tons of restaurants/bars around.', 'Their place is located near all the sites, making it easy to explore the city.', 'We highly recommend their place.  ', "We had a wonderful time at Chad & Ruben's place.", 'The room was as described and the location even better.', 'Very central, close to many nice shops and restaurants, you could walk everywhere or take a quick bus at a nearby stop.', 'Bed comfy and location was close to restaurants and public transportation.', 'We were delighted with the neighbourhood and were able find an overnight parking garage right around the corner (a little pricey but convenient).', 'I would absolutely stay here again and fully recommend the room for anyone looking for a great place near downtown Seattle.', 'This location is perfect to everything and everywhere I have planned for my Seattle trip as I used to lived on Capitol Hill and their house is close to public transportation and close to coffee shops I wanna go.', "It's a nice and safe neighborhood as well.", 'Their house is in a perfect location, quiet and comfortable.', "Great hosts, beautiful home, would love to return!Chad and Ruben's room was perfect for what we needed in Seattle's cool Capitol Hill neighborhood.", 'Walking distance to great places to eat and drink, shopping and convenient to downtown.', 'The location is  unbelievable - close to great restaurants, bars, and shopping.', "I'm in Seattle!Great place to stay - covenient & comfortable.  ", 'Only complaint was street parking is difficult to find in the area.  ', 'Great, quiet location, just steps away from coffee shops/restaurants/bars.', "Chad & Ruben's place was great.", 'Very conveniently located with some great restaurants around.', 'In all, a great place to stay.', 'What a beautiful home in a perfect location!', 'really great place, awesome neighborhood, and very cute dog!!Very clean and well-decorated room.', 'They made it super convenient and I felt extremely welcomed into their home.', 'The location was also perfect, right in the best part of Capitol Hill within easy walking distance to anything you might want.', 'From the cafe with excellent coffee around the corner to the diner-esque breakfast place just a few blocks away.

', 'Honestly, it felt like staying in a nice hotel.', 'The neighborhood was walking distance to cute shopping, food and cafes, and I actually easily walked to downtown as well (about 1.5 miles).Excellent accommodations in a good location in Capitol Hill area.  ', 'The home was centrally located and I easily found parking.', 'Chad and Ruben where not home during our stay, but where nice enough to allow us to stay there regardless.', 'The Capital Hill area is pretty cool and very walkable.  ', 'The only challenge for us was finding street parking.  ', 'We walked everywhere from this location - Pike Place, Queen Anne, Century Link Field, etc, so definitely a good location.', 'All the bus stops are near around the house, easy to get to downtown.', 'The location is perfect , lot of public transit all around.', 'Their home is in a fantastic neighborhood, and we were able to wander all over Capitol Hill and downtown on foot without any problems.', 'The house is very sweet and warm, just like the picture, more than clean and comfortable; the location of their house is very centre-located, 15 mins to downtown by walking and also have convenient public transportation nearby.', 'The place was great!  ', 'The directions to get to the place were on point, and the instructions for getting in worked well.  ', "Everything was as advertised and if I'm ever back in Seattle and would like to stay in Capitol Hill, I will definitely consider this place again.", 'Their home was a great place to come back to at night after traveling all around.', "The room's location is right in the heart of Capitol Hill, so it's walkable or quickly uber-able to just about everywhere we wanted to go.", 'Great location and very helpful hostWe had a great time.  ', 'The place was awesome!!The description was as described and very nice.', 'Great haven in the noise and bustle of Capital Hill and downtown.', 'Close to down town and from the nice broadway road district up town with many restaurants and bars
', 'Great area of town walkable to all major sites, and the room and bath were comfortable and private.', 'It is located in capitol hill, just arround the corner of most of the action and only a ten-minute stroll to downtown.', ', it was like i expect and the area around is very pleasant. 

', "The location couldn't have been better (try Glo's for breakfast and In the Bowl for every other meal).

", "I never actually met my hosts as our schedules didn't line up, but check-in was incredibly convenient and Chad & Ruben were very communicative.", "I'd certainly recommend this to anyone visiting the cityGreat location and awesome hosts.", 'Really nice neighborhood.', "Didn't spend lots of time in the listing but it was really nice to feel at home after a busy day on the city. 

", 'Highly recommend this place if you are in Seattle.', 'Chad & Ruben have a lovely home in the hip neighbourhood Capitol Hill.', "Plus the neighborhood is very quiet even though it's a hip, lively neighborhood.", 'I easily walked to and explored downtown one day, but on another day just stayed and explored the Capitol Hill area.', "As for the neighborhood: it's delightful.", 'Right off of the main road through Capitol Hill" A few blocks in another direction from Top Pot donuts (worth a visit), and in another direction from a fabulous coffeeshop that seems to be a favorite weekday morning stop for many people in the neighborhood.', 'They were flexible with our check in time and the place was very clean.', 'The location was perfect as well, everything was in walking distance.', 'Even when we took uber to downtown it was only $5 - $7.
', 'Chad and Reuben were extremely friendly and willing to offer suggestions about the area - food, transportation, things to do, etc.', 'The location is great and the neighborhood so lovely.

', 'Lovely room in a perfect area!

', "The space was clean, private, and comfortable and couldn't be more perfectly located to explore/experience the city.", 'When we visit again, we will definitely see if their place is available.', 'The location was super convenient to everything I wanted to do in Capital Hill.', 'I had several questions about the proximity to my workshop and restaurant recommendations.', 'The best location - easy to access to route 5 and walking distance to everywhere including all the coffee shops, local restaurants (Crumble and Flake is the best), super nice bed (high end mattress), very clean house with high ceiling, big and nice bathroom with a nice shower head, and the most, your own privacy (you will feel like you rent the whole house).  ', 'The location is perfect and the price is reasonable!', 'First of all, let me tell you how amazing this location was for my trip.', "It's literally within easy walking distance to nearly every Capitol Hill destination that you could imagine.", 'But with the amazing location comes difficult parking—something that was explicitly said in the listing.', 'It is a 15 min walk to downtown Seattle (or 2 min to the bus stop).', 'Great place, awesome location in Capital Hill.', 'Close to everything', 'and it worked out really well for my conference within walking distance at the Convention Center.', "Chad & Ruben's house is very lovely and is certainly in a fantastic location.", 'Great location.', 'Clean and tasteful decorated place and lovely bathroom with tub.', 'It was very well decorated with lots of helpful brochures and pamphlets for things to do around the city.', 'Great house in a great location', "The neighborhood was quite 'European' in character (we spend a lot of time in Germany), close to downtown, and well-stocked with coffee/bakery/meal options.", 'The room was very comfortable and location was convenient to walk or bus to many sites.  ', 'They provide a great quiet room with an adjacent bathroom.', 'The room feels completely separated from the main living areas in the house which gives it a fantastically quiet  and private experience.', 'They made our stay feel very warm as if we were staying with very close friends.', 'The house is at the best location in town - a quiet part of Capitol Hill.', 'We walked everywhere and felt so close to home.', 'The room and neighbourhood were exactly as described.', 'Even though we were in an area with lots of foot traffic, the bedroom and the house were quiet and we slept well.  ', 'The house is close to cafes, pubs and shops and we could walk to downtown.', "The location was perfect for a nightcap, some bar crawling, or a nice walk to many of Seattle's attractions.", 'All in all a wonderful place to stay.', 'The neighborhood was very walkable.  ', "Jackie and I had a wonderful stay at Chad and Ruben's lovely apartment.", 'Though our interactions were brief, I could tell that both Chad and Ruben have put considerable thought and care into their apartment and making sure that their guests feel welcome and accommodated.

', 'The neighborhood is great -- with restaurants, parks, bars, and a large grocery store all within easy walking distance.', "It's also a quick 30 minute walk or $7 uber ride to downtown/belltown.

", "We spent two days at Chad and Ruben's place on Capitol Hill.", 'The area is very lively with lost of place to eat, supermarket around the corner and a 20min walk downhill downtown.', 'The location is perfect, steps away from tons of restaurants and the energy of Capitol Hill.', 'From the house, we also easily walked to downtown, Pike Place, Union Lake, and many other locations.', 'I would recommend this to anyone hoping to stay near Capitol Hill!Quiet, cosy, and comfortable this', 'was the perfect place to stay on Capitol Hill.

', 'Everything was great, the location, the room, the bed and the private bathroom.  ', 'As I was on a budget, I took the train from the airport and then walked from downtown.  

', 'It was also an easy 20 minute walk to the Space Needle and downtown from the house.  ', 'I highly recommend it!What may have otherwise been a decent experience was marred by the horrendous parking situation.  ', 'There is NO street parking within blocks at any time of the day or night.  ', 'I wish the hosts had noted this prominently on their website, or provided some potential solutions (my flight was late -- I got in around 3:00 am, dealt with parking until 5:00 am, had to wake up again before 8:00 am to re-park my car.  ', 'Did not see (but did hear) the hosts although they responded promptly to my couple of messages about the area via email.  ', 'The place and neighborhood met most expectations.', 'Chad and Ruben offer an excellent clean, private, and quiet room in a great neighborhood which offers something for everyone, and just a short walk from downtown.', 'A lovely home and comfortable surroundings.', 'The neighborhood was wonderful for walking, dining, people-watching, house-looking, and some shopping.', 'The neighborhood is also quite nice and is in a great location.', 'The neighborhood is good and not too far from Downtown Seattle for either walking or buses.', 'Also an easy walk to downtown and even the Space Needle if your feeling frisky.', '2 other locations', 'Their room was nice and had everything you would need for a few nights including a lot of leaflets, maps and some guidebooks about Seattle.', 'The neighborhood was also nice, quite calm in their street but with more life (bars and restaurants) only some steps away.', 'The location is great and walking distance to all the great places in Capitol Hill.', 'Tons of Car2Gos around as well :)Super comfortable, conveniently located, and easily accessible room!', "We really enjoyed our stay at Chad&Ruben's place.", 'Great location.', "There's a great place for breakfast just across from the street on Olive Way."]

Big and comfortable bathroom and bed.', 'I was able to easily get to the bus and downtown without any hassle.  ', 'Green Lake was fun to walk around and the restaurants nearby were great.  ', 'A great place to stay.  ', 'I now have a really wonderful Friend and a place to stay when I travel to Seattle.', 'Thank you!Staying at Betty place was a real pleasure!', "Moreover it's a great location to explore Seattle.", 'Well, we definitely recommend anyone to stay at this place, and meet Betty and his son!Betty was a really nice host!', 'Perfect place to stay and if you want you are always invited to do stuff with the family.', 'I enjoyed the delicious "Dutch Baby" Betty served for breakfast, and appreciated her home's convenient location near many places of interest.  ', "Betty's place was wonderful.", 'The home is in a safe residential neighborhood and conveniently located for easy freeway access!  ', 'A great base location for our sty inSeattle.  ', 'Betty was helpful with recommendations for places to eat ant things to see, as well as parking hints.  ', 'We came into town for a late baseball game.', 'The house is located at the end of a very peaceful residential street.', 'The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful.', "Her place is easily accessible by transit that let's you get anywhere in the city in a quick manner. 

", "I couldn't recommend her place", 'Their lovely house is located in a residential area north of Downtown Seattle.  ', 'My wife and I wanted a place to stay close to all our favorite Green Lake/ Ballard stomping grounds before we relocate for work.', 'Being located at the end of a dead end made it safe and private but just minutes from the main roads.', 'We would definitely stay again with Betty if we come to town for a visit.', 'Neighborhood pleasant,  near North Seattle Community College and I-5.  ', 'She was pleasant and welcoming and the bedroom, bathroom and common areas were clean and well kept.  ', 'Place was on cul de sac and in quiet, pleasant neighborhood.  ', 'Very easy to reach from I-5.Neighborhood was very nice, and location easy to find.  ', 'We found a wonderful Italian restaurant nearby to have dinner while waiting to connect with our host.', 'She is friendly, communicative, and laid-back - I feel really lucky we found a place to stay nearby where we felt comfortable and could take the bus to work easily.  ', 'I should also mention that the area is quaint and beautiful - I enjoyed several walks in the neighborhood.', 'Betty was a wonderful host and her place was lovely, clean, and comfortable!', 'The location was perfect for us because family was just across the street.', 'Her home was located in a quiet easily accessible neighborhood that was so convenient for the things we needed to do in downtown Seattle.', "Overall great stay!Betty's place was perfect.", 'Wonderful place to stay - nice and cosy room and a great host!', "It's a very comfortable home in a good quiet neighborhood.  ", 'Enjoyed our stay!Quiet street, clean room.', 'Keys where not where they were supposed to be at check-in.', 'Spacious driveway area for parking.', 'We both consider this airbnb one of the best in North Seattle.  ', 'The neighborhood is very quiet and within walking distance to shops and parks.', 'We stayed in the room closest to the downstairs entrance, which was perfect since my roommate and I came home late from dinner.', "The neighborhood is lovely, quiet, and super close to Green Lake, where there's a great walking/running path.", 'The neighborhood was quiet and safe.', 'In general, this place is recommended.', 'Highly recommend this location which is a short walk to the lake and an easy bus ride to the city center.', "I highly recommend Betty's place.", 'The room was nice and clean, it was convenient to  take bus  to downtown and airport.', 'The neighbourhood was quiet and had eclectic houses to look at.  ', 'The park nearby was great for walking, swimming, and we even saw a play.', 'Because we had a car, and  she was conveniently located near two major arteries of the city,  we could get around easily.', 'The location was great as we were able to catch a bus downtown so we could leave our vehicle at her place.', 'There are many good things to be said about this place, not the least of which is Betty herself.', 'The house itself is relatively new, on a very quiet residential street and close to bus stops for buses (the 16 and the 48) that go downtown, to the U-District, Ballard or Wallingford.', 'It is less than a mile walk from the north end of Green Lake.  



', 'Another thing about the kitchen, which is on the second floor, is that it is adjacent to a wrap-around patio.', 'All in all, Betty’s house is a good choice for someone on a budget who wants to stay in a residential north Seattle neighborhood and does not mind using shared facilities.', 'Easy walk to the express bus on Aurora which got us downtown quickly and cost much less than parking would have.']

sents_0.5:
["Melissa and Abil's home is inviting, lovingly maintained, and was the perfect place to stay on our 5 day trip.  ", 'They were very helpful with suggesting transportation routes, things to do, and places to eat.  ', 'We are considering a move to Seattle and Melissa answered all of our questions and had a lot of great insight about the city she so clearly loves.  ', 'Their home is centrally located and a good home base for exploring many different parts of the city.  ', 'I would highly recommend their place to anyone and will definitely stay there again on future trips.  ', 'Beats a hotel in Seattle any day.', 'The couch, chair, and desk gave us a great private place to just sit and read or work.  ', 'This place is so much better than a hotel.  ', 'I put my mother up here for a week while she was in town.', "If you're looking for an amazing place to stay in Seattle, this is the place!", 'The location is good if you need to be close to the central Seattle area, and public transportation stops are
close by.  ', 'It was the perfect place to do both and within easy walking distance of Capitol Hill for all our restaurant, bar and shopping needs!', 'And the proximity to Pratt Art School, where I was taking a class, was perfect!', "Melissa was able to help direct us to great local spots like Chuck's, where you can get amazing beer and ice cream.

", 'The house is in a pleasant neighborhood that is a bit more bohemian than other parts of the city.', 'All in all I would say it was a great place for us to stay on our short visit to Seattle.the house is very nice,the host is very great！This was our first time using airbnb.', 'Great location too!', 'We walked to four different independent coffee houses as well as to the International District and many city parks.  ', 'Overall, it was more like a family gathering than a hotel experience.', 'We had a great experience with Melissa and Abil, they are very communicative and friendly, helped us a lot with  exploring the city.
', 'The house is in a nice area of Seattle, we liked to just walk there and look at the trees and houses.', "We couldn't have been happier with our time at Melissa and Abil's place.", 'The neighborhood is very safe and walkable--you can walk to Capitol Hill, Pike Place Market or the International District in 20-30 minutes.', 'This has to be the coziest coolest place to stay in Airbnb.', 'Better than 5-star hotel by far.', 'Place is super comfortable, bed is awesome, rooms are great, super fast wifi!', 'This place and hosts will make you feel at home and', 'If we have chance to come to Seattle, we will definitely visit this place again!!!!

', 'Scouting the perfect location for a short film can be one of the most difficult things to do on a budget.', 'When I saw the most suitable place (this is an understatement) on airbnb, not only was this couple open and excited about the idea of accommodating a film crew, but they helped us through the whole day as well.', 'When Melissa gave a tour of the whole place (they also have their own costume studio), I wondered how the house was so perfectly charming and victorian, and the only explanation has to be the years of hard work and artistic talent she and Abil put into creating it.', 'As a seasoned traveler myself, I have often wondered where someone would stay in Seattle to feel not like a traveler/tourist, but a resident of a home.', 'This is that place.

', "I arrived late nite on a short notice booking, and Melissa and her partner Abil were extremely warm and friendly welcoming me to their huge, historical home in Seattle's central district.  ", 'The neighborhood is residential  and quiet.  ', 'A few restaurants within walking distance.  ', 'Take the 3 or 4 bus from the corner stop to 3rd street, from  3rd you can walk, bus , train, or trolley anywhere.  ', 'Get a samosa at the bodega across from the bus stop while you are waiting.
 ', 'The neighborhood is convenient to downtown and to Capitol Hill and is lovely in its own right.  ', 'If you bring a car, the hosts will provide you a guest pass allowing you to park in the street without time restrictions.', 'I met friendly people from the UK, China and South America.

', 'Their home is a true Seattle historical gem that is beautiful inside and out.', 'The house is located in a really fun neighborhood with many bars and restaurants within walking distance.', 'I only wish that I had had more time to explore the neighborhood and house.', 'Courtney who welcomed us when we arrived immediately attended to our needs by answering the typical queries of a first timer in a place.  ', 'The place was as pictured, if not more.', 'In this case the place was much nicer "live".
', 'Their garden and outdoor sitting area was picturesque with flowers birds squirrels and a very cool housecat smartly named El Gato.', 'We were greeted with warm friendly smiles, with a beautiful room waiting for us in a gorgeous location convenient to all the places we wanted to see.', 'They welcomed me by message on Airbnb first, and then made sure I could get to their location without any trouble.', 'I find myself feeling at home in this place. 

', 'It is also a safe neighborhood to walk around.  ', "The neighborhood is a bit old fashion but it has great bus lines that'll take you to UW and downtown area without any transfers.", 'Parking is super easy which is also a plus, most likely will stay here', "We were so grateful for their travel recommendations, since we were traveling from the NYC area and weren't too familiar with the neighborhood.", 'Their bed and breakfast is beautiful, conveniently located, and there was plenty of on-street parking on their block.', 'The two bathrooms they have are convenient, clean and well equipped.

', 'All in all, this is a great place to stay for anyone coming to Seattle.  ', 'It is also especially close to Seattle University.  ', 'Everything including daily procedures, home etiquette, directions to and from downtown Seattle, as well as transportation, and nearby restaurants and cafes.  ', "There's also a lounge area out back in the shed which they've transformed into a cozy space for a recreation of your choice.  ", "Just can't say enough good things about this place.   ", "I will definitely return the next time I'm in town!", "Location wise, it's a close walk to the Capital Hill area and a longer walk and short uber ride to Pike's place.", 'So lucky to have found this place and will stay here again if we come back to Seattle!!This place is hands down the BEST bnb you can imagine.', 'The muffins for breakfast are to die for (and Pikes Place beer stocked in the fridge is a bonus).', "Our hosts had great knowledge and understanding of the local area and their passion for showing off Seattle made our stay the most incredible experience we've ever had traveling.", "If you're in town make this your number one stop for AirBnB, you will love it!", 'and I had a great time chatting with them about the wonderful city.', 'Street parking was not a problem, and the location itself is convenient to downtown.', 'Overall, Melissa and Abil made us feel right at home with their kind hospitality, and I would not hesitate to stay at their place again in the future.', 'Super wonderful place to stay for any trip you have to the Seattle area.', 'The location was great for us (just a short stroll to get to downtown or public transport) and our room was very nice, clean and cozy.', "All in all, the reviews don't lie; very positive experience and a great place to enjoy what the city has to offer!From the moment", 'They also were flexible on when I turned in my keys and parking pass which was helpful since I had to be at a conference until 4pm.  ', 'This place is amazing.', 'They have a great knowledge of the city and great suggestions for things to do.', "We walked down to Downtown Seattle, it's only 30 min and it a great way to discover the city.", 'The neighborhood is very pleasant and peaceful.', 'There are some very nice restaurants near by', "and we're also close by Lake Washington for a nice run on the morning."]
